text: By the end of this module, you'll be able to do the following. Understand why professional traders use volume profiling as their preferred choice of trading tool. You'll be able to define between subjective and objective market analysis. Develop your own trading edge by following a step by step process that I will provide You'll be able to identify various timeframe participants, but more importantly understand when and why those timeframe participants enter the market. Interpret the key principles that define the auction process. Be able to identify and apply the key metrics of the volume profile. Recognise and utilise volume profile anomalies. And, lastly, answer the questions at the end of each part and be able to update your own trading playbook.
transcript: By the end of this module, you'll be able to do the following. Understand why professional traders use volume profiling as their preferred choice of trading tool. Interpret the key principles that define the auction process. Be able to identify and apply the key metrics of the volume profile. Recognise and utilise volume profile anomalies. And, lastly, answer the questions at the end of each part and be able to update your own trading playbook.
